content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to search for rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking in Norway. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather a list of rental companies and lodging options for kayaking near Naeroyfjord in Norway, including guided tours and self-guided options. I wrote this information to a file named "rental_lodging_options.txt" using the "write_to_file" command, and confirmed the file was created using the "list_files" command.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "rental_lodging_options.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best kayaking routes in Norway"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/", "https://www.firebirdtours.com/blog/top-10-norway-kayaking-trip-routes", "https://www.muchbetteradventures.com/magazine/a-guide-to-kayaking-in-norway/", "https://kayakmoretomorrow.com/norways-5-best-self-guided-sea-kayak-trips/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g190455-Activities-c61-t191-Norway.html", "https://expeditionengineering.com/kayaking-in-norway/", "https://www.kimkim.com/c/ultimate-guide-to-kayaking-rafting-in-norway", "https://www.wikiloc.com/trails/kayaking-canoeing/norway"]', type='action_result')]
"""
